name: ItzaBitza
description: In the award winning game ItzaBitza™ , drawings truly come to life. Kids help their Sketchy by using Living Ink™ - a unique drawing recognition system – to draw one-of-a kind interactive objects that form the centerpiece of the game's action.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista or 7Processor: 1 Ghz or faster Memory: 512 MB RAMGraphics: 64 MB DirectX® 9.0c compliant (1024×768 or greater screen resolution)Sound: DirectX® 9.0c compliant

reviews.review_text: Definately for kids at the preschool to kindergarten level . 9/10
